workingHoursConfig.title: Working Hours
workingHoursConfig.subtitle: Configure office working hours and attendance rules
workingHoursConfig.workStartTimeLabel: When does the work day start?
workingHoursConfig.workStartTimeHint: Employees who clock in after this time + grace period will be marked as late
workingHoursConfig.workEndTimeLabel: When does the work day end?
workingHoursConfig.workEndTimeHint: Standard time for auto-completing incomplete attendance records
workingHoursConfig.breakDurationLabel: How long is the standard break?
workingHoursConfig.breakDurationHint: Standard break duration in minutes (default: 60 minutes = 1 hour)
workingHoursConfig.gracePeriodLabel: How many minutes of grace period for late arrival?
workingHoursConfig.gracePeriodHint: Employees who arrive within this time after start time won't be marked as late

info.resetToDefaults: Settings reset to default values. Click Save to apply.
